rmour Proficiency Information

Wearing Heavy Armour will not impose Disadvantage on your Attack Rolls or prevent you from casting spells.

How to unlock Heavy Armour Proficiency

Heavy Armour Proficiency can be acquired by

Cleric (Life Domain Subclass at level 1) Cleric (Nature Domain Subclass at level 1) Cleric (Tempest Domain Subclass at level 1) Cleric (War Domain Subclass at level 1) Fighter Lvl 1 Ranger Knight (Favored Enemy - Ranger Lvl 1) Paladin (Lvl 1) Heavily Armoured Feat
